text: Samantha Morton (born 13 May 1977) is an English actress. She was born in Nottingham. She has been nominated for many major awards for her acting. She began acting in 1991, although it was 2000 when she received recognition from worldwide. In particular she has been in movies, including Sweet and Lowdown (1999) and Minority Report (2002). == Other websites == * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Nottinghamshire Category:British child actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Nottingham Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Samantha Morton
